author: Loukas Karampogias
comment: There were some problems initially, i.e. the screen kept reseting from ambient to normal mode. There are still problems, like the temp indicator stuck at F instead of C as set.   But this is the most beautiful design, and many kudos for including the step counter.   I now wish the temp indicator is fixed.
